# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and contribute to substantial growth. Given its exceptional capabilities and the value it can bring to your organization, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire this product for a special introductory price of $1200000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best possible value while also securing a competitive advantage in your market. I look forward to discussing how this product can be a game-changer for your company. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
